short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily tweet highlighted text with source from any webpage in a click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
QuickTweet lets you effortlessly share web snippets on Twitter with a click, automatically citing the source. Perfect for quotes, stats, or article snippets, it makes sharing knowledge quick and easy.

How to Use QuickTweet
1. Optional: Pin QuickTweet for one-click access.
2. Select text anywhere online.
3. Right-click and choose QuickTweet, or click the pinned icon.

Learn more at https://www.wolfglobal.org/
